channel.title: Home on INSCRIPTION AT SALONAE
channel.description: Recent content in Home on INSCRIPTION AT SALONAE

item.title: Poem of the Week - Prayer
item.description:
Prayer

I ask you this:
Which way to go?
I ask you this:
Which sin to bear?
Which crown to put
Upon my hair?
I do not know,
Lord God,
I do not know.
– Langston Hughes, Selected Poems (2020), publ. Serpent’s Tail

item.title: Poem of the Week - Ah Vastness of Pines
item.description: This is a new series of posts I’m going to try to stick to, if only to let me rediscover and rethink some of my favourite poetry. Another bonus is that it’ll keep this blog updated and alive.

item.title: A Short Guide to Plant Names
item.description: A short guide I wrote for myself on Latin plant names (mainly stolen and truncated from Gardener’s World. Enjoy!

item.title: A Note on Comic Books in My Collection
item.description: Over the past few days I’ve taken to reading comic books, specifically Hellblazer and Hellboy.

item.title: End of Year Book Roundup
item.description: A lot has happened to me this year and the books I’ve read certainly reflect that.

item.title: First Week
item.description: So my first week of college just wrapped up so I thought I’d share my thoughts about how it went down.

item.title: Books
item.description: Here are all the books I’ve read sorted by the month I finished them. Yearly book target: 10/45 CURRENTLY READING: Weird Woods, Tales from the Haunted Forests of Britain - ed. John Miller The Left Hand of Darkness - Ursula K. le Guin Biology of Plants - Peter H. Raven, Ray F. Evert and Susan E. Eichhorn The Grapes of Wrath - John Steinbeck MAY 2024 The Autobiography of Malcolm X As Told to Alex Haley - Malcolm X APRIL 2024 Slouching Towards Bethlehem - Joan Didion A Gentleman in Moscow - Amor Towles MARCH 2024 Night Sky with Exit Wounds - Ocean Vuong Dune - Frank Herbert Time is a Mother - Ocean Vuong FEBRUARY 2024 Twenty Love Poems and a Song of Despair - Pablo Neruda JANUARY 2024 The Premonitions Bureau - Sam Knight The Monkey Wrench Gang - Edward Abbey John Constantine Hellblazer #1, Original Sins - Jamie Delano, John Ridgway, Alfredo Alcala, Rick Veitch and Tom Mandrake DECEMBER 2023 Songs of Innocence and of Experience - William Blake The Theban Plays (King Oedipus, Oedipus at Colonus, Antigone) - Sophocles Electra and Other Plays (Philoctetes, Women of Trachis, Electra, Ajax) - Sophocles NOVEMBER 2023 The Song of Achilles - Madeline Miller OCTOBER 2023 The Secret History - Donna Tartt SEPTEMBER 2023 The Last of The Wine - Mary Renault Storyland - Amy Jeffs JUNE 2023 The Sailor Who Fell From Grace With The Sea - Yukio Mishima Selected Poems - Langston Hughes Cider With Rosie - Laurie Lee MAY 2023 The Graveyard Book - Neil Gaiman The Unfortunates - B.

item.title: Plans Before College
item.description: I start college in little under a month so I thought it’d be a good idea to go over what I’m doing to ease myself back into education.

item.title: First Steps With LMMS
item.description: I recently decided to start recording some of the songs I make with my acoustic guitar. The problem is that with my current setup anything I record sounds like shit.
